graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:CommonCreateAdministrativeAreaLevel1Input!)
{
	commonCreateAdministrativeAreaLevel1 (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		countryId
		code
		customCode
		name
		slug
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		mapType
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonGetAdministrativeAreasLevel1 (query: $query)
	{
		id
		code
		customCode
		name
		slug
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		mapType
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonFindAdministrativeAreaLevel1 (query: $query)
	{
		id
		code
		customCode
		name
		slug
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		mapType
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	commonFindAdministrativeAreaLevel1ById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		code
		customCode
		name
		slug
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		mapType
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:CommonUpdateAdministrativeAreaLevel1Input!)
{
	commonUpdateAdministrativeAreaLevel1 (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		code
		customCode
		name
		slug
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		mapType
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	commonDeleteAdministrativeAreaLevel1ById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		code
		customCode
		name
		slug
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		mapType
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonDeleteAdministrativeAreasLevel1 (query: $query)
	{
		id
		code
		customCode
		name
		slug
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		mapType
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
